comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Cal Delaney (birth name Harold J. Delaney) (1893-1954) was a Lightweight active in the ring from 1911 to 1923. Bout list at BoxRec. Johnny Kilbane (John Patrick Kilbane, 1889-1957) was a World Champion Featherweight whose boxing career ran mainly from 1907 to 1923, though he had one fight in 1934. Bout list at BoxRec. Kilbane won a decision over Delaney at Akron, Ohio, on October 11, 1915. The pair had also fought a five round exhibition match at Cleveland, Ohio, on March 1, 1913. I can't find any other matches between them. Johnny Kilbane went on to serve in the Ohio State Senate and the Ohio State House of Representatives during the 1940s. There is a web site about him.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
